page.title: 13LAND COVER AROUND PENNARD.
page.content: MOST OF THE LANDSCAPE IN OUR RECTANGLE IS GRASSLAND AND FIELDS. TO THE WEST AND SOUTH OF THE RECTANGLE THERE IS SEA,CLIFFS BEACHES.THE LOWER SLOPES OF CEFN BRYN, A LARGE HILL OF 186 METRES IN HEIGHT, ARE TO BE FOUND IN THE WEST OF THE RECTANGLE. THE VILLAGES OF NICHOLASTON AND PENMAEN ARE FOUND THERE ALSO. THREE CAMPING SITES AND SEVERAL FARMS ARE FOUND IN THE AREA. ONE OF THE FARM HOUSES IS OVER 200 YEARS OLD. ANOTHER HAS ITS FIFTH GENERATION LIVING THERE. OTHER BUILDINGS INCLUDE THE POST OFFICE IN SOUTHGATE. IT SELLS SWEETS, COMICS AND BISCUITS. THERE IS A CHEMIST THERE TOO. FURTHER UP THE ROAD IS PENNARD STORES. IT SELLS CRAFTS,CARDS & GAMES. NEARBY IS AN OLD PEOPLES HOME. IN THE SCHOOL GROUNDS IS THE COMMUNITY CENTRE A SURGERY IS JOINED TO THE COMMUNITY CENTRE. A LIBRARY IS NEARBY.
